forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun casts its warm glow across the city, lifting spirits and illuminating the streets. The forecast hints at a high near 67 degrees; however, as the afternoon unfolds, a gentle cooling breeze from the west southwest, playful in its whispers, nudges temperatures down to a comfortable 64. The skies above are largely clear, allowing a good view of the Golden Gate Bridge, though the familiar dance of fog loiters along the horizon, teasing the edges of the bay. As twilight draws closer, expect a transition to a more subdued ambiance, with mostly cloudy skies settling in and a low of around 57 enriching the atmosphere with an inviting chill.

For those venturing out, dressing in layers will serve you well as the day evolves from sunshine to the gentle embrace of evening coolness. A light jacket or cardigan will be your ally when the marine layer rolls in, creating a soothing backdrop against the lively cityscape. The conditions are ripe for casual strolls through local parks or leisurely coffee breaks at sidewalk cafés, where the soft sounds of the city blend harmoniously with pleasant company—a perfect way to savor the afternoon's offerings before the city dons its nightcap of cloud.
